name: Elevance Health, Inc.
summary: Elevance Health, Inc., formerly known as Anthem, Inc., is a leading American health insurance and managed healthcare company headquartered in Indianapolis. Serving over 45 million medical members, Elevance Health offers a broad range of medical, pharmacy, dental, vision, and behavioral health products, and is an independent licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association. The company is recognized for its integrated whole-health approach, digital healthcare innovations, and commitment to improving health outcomes for individuals and communities.
